participant_1.background:
My family was the first to accept me for who I am, with my curly hair and snake.
i am allergic to apples yet still eat them.
i like to bike.
i own a mansion that i do not live in.
i am a retired school teacher.

participant_2.background:
My first purchase was a pair of shoes to fit my growing feet.
I'm usually hungover and looking for my next drink.
i love animals and i want to help them.
My days are spent working, exercising, and trying to balance my work and family life.
i have a cat named pickles.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
I'm doing well. Just got back from a bike ride. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks. I'm retired now, so I spend most of my time biking, reading, and watching TV.
I'm not retired yet, but I'm looking forward to it one day. I'm a teacher, and I love my job, but I'm also looking forward to having more free time.
I'm glad you love your job. I was a teacher for many years, and I loved it too.
I taught math and science. What do you teach?
I teach kindergarten. I love working with kids.
I can imagine. Kids are so much fun. I have a lot of nieces and nephews, and I love spending time with them.
I have a cat named Pickles. He's my best friend.
I love cats. I used to have a cat named Mittens, but she passed away a few years ago.
I'm sorry to hear that. It's hard to lose a pet.
It is. But I'm glad I had her for the time that I did.
Me too. Pets are a great way to add happiness to your life.
I agree. They're always there for you, no matter what.
